paragraph: Sanela Sijerčić is a Bosnian folk singer from Sarajevo. She has released six albums and received a "Folk Oscar" in 2006. She has also been named the "Female singer of the year" (in Bosnia).  She reportedly "retired" from active recording and performing by 2009.
[1] Sanelle Sijercic (Kap Ko Kap) Nimfa Sound Album
